snippet.title: Samurai Zero - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the official reveal trailer for Samurai Zero!

Samurai Zero is a Multiplayer Action RPG Game set in a Science Fantasy world called Edo. Every conflict is an intense champloo of the power of the unknown, Samurai Power Fantasy and over the top action - akin to the bombastic fighting presentation commonly seen in various anime.

In Samurai Zero, defined characters, each with their own special abilities and personalities, fight across an ever changing fantasy landscape inspired from the Japanese Age of the Samurai. 
-
Samurai Zero Website: https://samuraizero.com
Patreon: https://patreon.com/neointeractive
Twitter: https://twitter.com/playsamuraizero
Instagram: https://instagram.com/playsamuraizero
Facebook: https://facebook.com/playsamuraizero
